constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 220 (Thursday, December 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHRADER:
H.R. 6346.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has the authority to act under Article I, Sec. 8,
clause 3--the Commerce Clause.
[Page H7840]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

title: To amend the Grand Ronde Reservation Act to address the hunting, fishing, trapping, and animal gathering rights of the Confederated Tribes of the Grand Ronde Community, and for other purposes.
